title: Tata Motors signs MoU with Tamil Nadu govt for manufacturing plant; to invest Rs 9,000 crore over 5 years
description: Tata Motors and the Tamil Nadu Government have signed a Memorandum of Understanding (MoU) to build a vehicle manufacturing facility in the state, with an investment of Rs 9,000 crore over five years. The agreement will create 5,000 jobs and further bolster employment generation in the state. The move follows Vietnamese electric vehicle maker VinFast's automobile manufacturing investment in the southern state.
